QuestData.Title: Pollen Power
QuestData.Description: Those of us who grew up in Gorgrond have long learned a few secrets of the botani that can be used to grow our own plants.$b$bThere is no such thing as a hungry Laughing Skull for this reason.$b$bThe ravagers are the key.$b$bOutside of Evermorn Springs you will find ravagers of every type. Slay them and bring me the pollen they carry, and I can cultivate it to be of use to your garrison.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah... yes, yes, yes. Fresh pollen. With a dash of a few secret ingredients you can feed an army with the food you could grow from this, if you know the secret ways.
